pages.title: Modifying Vault Gear
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Gear$() can be modified through various means, for example, decreasing the minimum level required to make use of the gear piece, adding and removing modifiers, rerolling, targetting a specific modifier and much more!

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: Vault Gear can be obtained through various means such as looting inside the Vault, crafting Legendary Treasures, opening Completion Crates, or crafting it with Vault Materials.
